price: Gara maatii isaa deebi’eeti mirgoo (jibicha) gabbataan dhufe.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
